column2: "Na EWURADZE benya ayamuhyehye wɔ Jakob ho
column3: na ɔasan mu eyi Israel bio
column4: na ɔdze hɔn esi hɔnankasa hɔn asaase do; na ɔnanaben dze noho abɔ hɔn ho

column2: "Na aman no bɛfa hɔn
column3: na wɔdze hɔn aba hɔn tsenabea
column4: na Israel fie afa hɔn ayɛ nkowaa na mfonabaa wɔ EWURADZE asaase no do
column5: na wɔafa hɔn ndɔmmumfafo no ndɔmmum; na wɔahom hɔn ahyɛdofo do."

column2: "Na ɔbɛba dɛ da a EWURADZE bɛma wo ahomgye efi wo yaw
column3: wo fona
column4: na wo nhyɛsom dzendzen a wɔdze wo kɔr mu no mu no
column8: Mbrɛ ɔhyɛdofo esi egyaa a! Sika kurow no edua abɔ adze a!"

column2: "EWURADZE ebubu omumuyɛnyi n’abaa
column3: na mpanyindzifo ahempoma so;"

column2: "nyia ɔdze ebufuw bobɔɔ aman bobɔ a onngyaa da
column3: na ɔdze ebufuw hoom amanaman do hyɛɛ hɔn amen a obi ennsianka no."

column2: "Asaase nyina adwe
column3: na ɔayɛ dzinn: wɔtow ehurusi ndwom."

column2: "Nyew
column3: ɔpepeaa so nya wo ho enyigye
column4: na Lebanon nkyindur ndua ka dɛ
column5: Ofitsi dɛ wɔdze wo too famu yi
column6: ɔtowfo biara mmfowee mmbaa hɛn do."

column2: "Samanadze efi ase akeka noho dɛ oribehyia wo mbae kwan; okenyan ewufo ma wo; hɔn a nkyɛ wɔyɛ asaase do etsitsir nyinara no a; ɔama amanaman ahemfo nyinara asoɛrsoɛr efifi hɔn nhengua do."
"Hɔn nyinara bɛgye do na wɔaka akyerɛ wo dɛ
column3: Ɔwoara so na egura dɛ hɛn yi? Ayɛ dɛ hɛnara so pɛr yi?"

column2: "Wɔabrɛ w’akɛseyɛ adze akɔ samanadze
column3: na wo mbɛntasanku dede no; wɔasɛw nsaamaa mpa dɛ wɔ w’ase

column2: "Mbrɛ edua na ifi sor ahwe ase a
column3: Ao Adzekyee Nworaba
column4: Anapa ba! Mbrɛ woedua etwa wo ato famu a
column5: ɔwo a ebrɛɛ amanaman adze no!"

column2: "Na ekae wɔ w’akoma mu dɛ
column3: Mobɔfow makɔ sor
column5: mebɛma m’ahengua do atra; na matsena mboanofo bepɔw no do wɔ kwaamu afamu etsifi ano noho tɔnn."

column2: "Mobɔfow matra nsuwusiw n’etsifi no ho ara; mebɛyɛ moho dɛ Abɔso no."
"Naaso wɔabrɛ wo adze akɔ samanadze ekodu mona no n’ase noho ara."
"Hɔn a wohu wo bɔhwɛ wo kann Wɔbɔdwen wo ho dɛ
column3: Aso nyimpa no a ɔmaa asaase wosowee
column4: na ɔmaa ahendzi hihimii no nye yi;"

column2: "nyia ɔmaa wiadze yi yɛɛ dɛ sar
column3: na obutuuw no mu nkurow; na oenngyaa n’adaduafo ma wɔaannkɔ fie nye yi?"

column2: "Amanaman ahemfo nyinara deda enyimnyam mu
column3: obiara deda nankasa n’adakamona mu."

column2: "Na ɔwo dze
column3: wɔatow wo efi w’asamandan mu akyen
column5: dɛ atɔfo a afona ehwirahwira hɔn mu na woesian kɔ mona no n’abo ho na wɔakata wo do; dɛ fun a ɔnamɔn etsiatsia do."

column2: "Wɔnnkɛfa wo aka hɔn ho wɔ efunsie mu
column3: osiandɛ asɛɛ w’asaase
column4: ekuku wo mamba. Emumuyɛfo asefo edzin dze

column2: "Hom nsiesie ekumii mma mba no wɔ hɔn egyanom emumuyɛ ntsi; ama wɔaannsoɛr ammfa asaase no enndzi do
column3: na wɔaammfa nkurow annhyɛ wiadze mu ma."

column2: "Na mobɔsoɛr etsia hɔn
column3: dɔm EWURADZE na ɔse. Na metwa dzin na hɔn a wɔaka
column4: mba na asefo nyinara efi Babilɔn."

column2: "Na mebɛyɛ no nkɔtɔkɔ tsenabew
column3: na nsu ntaataae so
column4: na medze ɔsɛɛ mena mapra no

column2: "Dɔm EWURADZE aka ntam
column3: Ampaara
column6: na dɛ mbrɛ mobɔɔ tsirmpɔw no

column2: "dɛ mubobubu Asirianyi no wɔ m’asaase do
column3: na medze m’anamɔn etsiatsia no do wɔ me mbepɔw do; nna no kɔndua befi hɔn do akɔ

column2: "Iyi nye tsirmpɔw a wɔabɔ ɔfa asaase nyina ho; na iyi nye nsa a wɔatsen no wɔ amanaman nyina do."
"Na dɔm EWURADZE abɔ tsirmpɔw
column3: na woana botum ama ayɛ gyan? Na ɔatsen ne nsa

column2: "Afe a ɔhen Ahaz wui no mu
column3: na atsɛmbusɛm yi bae."

column2: "Mma nndzi ehurusi
column3: ɔwo Filistia nyina
column4: dɛ abaa a ɔhwee wo no ebu ntsi: na ɔwɔ no ndwow mu na ɔkyerben befir aba
column5: na n’aba bɛyɛ dɛ ogya abowatsena a otu."

column2: "Na ɔbɔbɔfo n’abakan bedzidzi
column3: na ohianyi ada hɔ dwudwoodwo: na medze ɔkɔm boku wo ndwow
column4: na wo nkaasefo so wobokuku hɔn."

column2: "Abobokɛse e
column3: twa ewuo; kurow e
column4: keka mu; ɔwo Filistia nyina ma w’akoma ntu; na wusiw fi kwaamu afamu reba
column5: na no dɔm mu obiara nnkegyina ekyir."

column2: "Ebɛn asɛm na wɔdze bobua amanaman asomafo no? Dɛ EWURADZE dze Zion etsim hɔ
column3: na no mu na ne man mu amandzehufo benya guandɔbew."
